name: Bailey44
overview:
Bailey44 is a women’s contemporary clothing brand designed and manufactured in Los Angeles, California. Founded in 2006 by two female fashion industry veterans with expertise in design and sales, the founders’ vision of street smarts and intelligent femininity combined with impeccable fit quickly spread. In a few short years they established Bailey44 as the brand for the effortlessly sexy, agelessly cool woman.

The look of Bailey44 is sleek, modern silhouettes in statement colors and fabrics, made extraordinary by well-versed imaginations and a keen eye for the zeitgeist. Today Bailey44 is carried in exclusive department stores and specialty boutiques in North America and Europe, and its following continues to grow as women look to Bailey44 for clothing they can be their best selves in.
